content.raw:
I am happy to see progress on this issue!
For the cross-platform test, it is not easier to write some platform specific code for each supported platform, instead of trying to launch a 
python interpreter just to get some memory information?The amount of code required for each platform should be limited, see [1].

[1] http://stackoverflow.com/questions/63166/how-to-determine-cpu-and-memory-consumption-from-inside-a-process
